MAN.TITLE: label_properties
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: description of the Label entity properties

DESCRIPTION.P: The Label entity is a leaf of the graphics entities hierarchy. This entity defines the parameters for label drawing

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: visible:
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: This field contains the visible property value for the entity . It should be "on" or "off" .By default, the label is visible, the value's property is "on". If "off" the label is not displayed on the screen.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: text:
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: This field is the character string vector which contains the label.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: font_size:
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: The font_size property is used to select the type of size of the label. Its value should be an integer in between 0 and 5 which stands for 8pt, 10pt, 12pt, 14pt, 18pt and 24pt.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: font_style:
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: Seven differents fonts are available : "Courrier", "Symbol", "Times", "Times Italic", "Times Bold", "User defined". The font_size property is an index in [0 6] which is associated to the previous font names.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: foreground:
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: This field contains the color used to display the label. Its value should be a color index (relative to the current colormap).

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: parent:
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: This property contains the handle of the parent. The parent of the label entity should be of type "Axes" .
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.P: Note that, for now, Label entity is exclusively used in title, x_label, y_label and z_label building.
